name: Squid Fire Knight
originalText:
2 — {T}: The next time target player would roll one or more dice this turn, instead they roll that many dice plus one, then you choose one of those rolls to ignore.
3 — Protection from odd mana values
2 — 4/1
4 — 6/6
text:
{TK}{TK} — {T}: The next time target player would roll one or more dice this turn, instead they roll that many dice plus one, then you choose one of those rolls to ignore.
